mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(m_id, m_api, m_passwd, m_name, m_phone, m_email, m_del) VALUES (#{m_id}, #{m_api}, #{m_passwd}, #{m_name}, #{m_phone}, #{m_email}, 'N')

INSERT INTO empl(e_num, m_id, e_image, e_corp, e_dept, e_rank, e_task, e_certifi, e_career, e_intro, e_ok, e_del) VALUES (seq_e.nextval, #{m_id}, #{e_image}, #{e_corp}, #{e_dept}, #{e_rank}, #{e_task}, #{e_certifi}, #{e_career}, #{e_intro}, 'N', 'N')
